name: cocha-lakes
description: Website with map animations about lakes

scripts.build: npx babel js/caption.js js/animations.js js/slideshow.js js/script.js -o js/full.script.js && npx minify js/full.script.js > js/script.min.js && npx postcss css/style.css --use autoprefixer --no-map -o css/style.prefix.css && npx minify css/style.prefix.css > css/style.min.css && npx minify index.html > index.min.html

author: fgz
